results.title: Low-dose simvastatin improves survival and ventricular function via eNOS in congestive heart failure.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment significantly improved (P < 0.01) left ventricular function and significantly (P < 0.01) abrogated @DISEASE_Cardiomegaly @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011654 @@@pulmonary edema@@@ compared with vehicle treatment.

citations.NLM: Greer JJ, Kakkar AK, Elrod JW, Watson LJ, Jones SP, Lefer DJ. Low-dose simvastatin improves survival and ventricular function via eNOS in congestive heart failure. Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol. 2006 Dec;291(6):H2743-51. PMID: 16844920
citations.BibTeX: @article{16844920, title={Low-dose simvastatin improves survival and ventricular function via eNOS in congestive heart failure.}, author={Greer JJ and Kakkar AK and Elrod JW and Watson LJ and Jones SP and Lefer DJ}, journal={Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol}, volume={291}, number={6}, pages={H2743-51}}

results.title: Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis in a patient with chronic renal failure.
results.text_hl: Her symptoms of @DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@muscle pain@@@, @DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, myoglobulinuria, @DISEASE_Oliguria @DISEASE_MESH:D009846 @@@oliguria@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011654 @@@pulmonary oedema@@@ appeared 48 h after the first dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Al Shohaib S. Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis in a patient with chronic renal failure. Am J Nephrol. 2000 May-Jun;20(3):212-3. PMID: 10878403
citations.BibTeX: @article{10878403, title={Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis in a patient with chronic renal failure.}, author={Al Shohaib S}, journal={Am J Nephrol}, volume={20}, number={3}, pages={212-3}}

results.title: Pravastatin But Not Simvastatin Improves Survival and Neurofunctional Outcome After Cardiac Arrest and Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation
results.text_hl: In contrast, lipophilic @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ did not modulate survival but increased @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011654 @@@pulmonary edema@@@ and impaired endothelial cell function.

citations.NLM: Bergt S, Grub A, Wagner S, Engelke H, Nöldge-Schomburg G, Vollmar B, Roesner JP, Wagner NM. Pravastatin But Not Simvastatin Improves Survival and Neurofunctional Outcome After Cardiac Arrest and Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation JACC Basic Transl Sci. 2017 Apr;2(2):149-159. PMID: 30167563
citations.BibTeX: @article{30167563, title={Pravastatin But Not Simvastatin Improves Survival and Neurofunctional Outcome After Cardiac Arrest and Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation}, author={Bergt S and Grub A and Wagner S and Engelke H and Nöldge-Schomburg G and Vollmar B and Roesner JP and Wagner NM}, journal={JACC Basic Transl Sci}, volume={2}, number={2}, pages={149-159}}
